meanings.sent1: I need some ackers to buy a new toy.
meanings.sent2: He counted his ackers carefully before going to the store.
meanings.sent3: The ackers in my piggy bank are feeling lonely.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled at the sight of the shiny ackers.
meanings.sent5: The sound of ackers jingling in his pocket made him smile.

meanings.definition: relating to or characteristic of money or cash
meanings.sent1: The ackers business deal was finalized yesterday.
meanings.sent2: She wore a dress with ackers patterns on it.
meanings.sent3: The ackers-themed party was a huge success.
meanings.sent4: His smile was as bright as ackers in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The room was decorated with ackers-colored balloons and streamers.
